text:
Indian shares fluctuated between gains and losses following weak trade in Asian peers as index heavyweight Reliance Industries advanced, countering decline in financial stocks.The S&P BSE Sensex was little changed at 28,914 after swinging in a 120-point range. Meanwhile, the NSE Nifty too was unchanged at 8,947.






Here are the stocks moving the market this morning:
title: Stocks Radar: ONGC, Reliance Industries, Coal India, SPARC And More
